TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Update GeometricDefinition and OrganisationOperationalStatusCode of Organisations.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for all the operational elements (defined by IDT Schema Documentation > Organisations.xsd > PoliceGroup, as an example organisation, it might be any other) and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message elements to update the GeometricDefinition and OrganisationOperationalStatusCode of organisations. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Organisation and all elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates an example Organisation with known values for its GeometricDefinition and OrganisationOperationalStatusCode elements, with name XXX_PG_046 and fills at least ALL its mandatory elements.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Organisation: ITA_PG_001
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the example Organisation and all elements that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates an update for the object by changing its * GeometricDefinition > PointType * OperationalStatusQualifierCode
Elements, keeping the former values for the rest of elements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the updated GeometricDefinition and OrganisationOperationalStatusCode of the example Organisations.
